contentencoded: The effects of the economic downturn are far and wide. While slowdowns used to be a good time to return to education, people are having a tough time finding financial aid, and taking on student-loan debt is scarier than ever.

title: ARW Behind the Scenes: Episode 6, Education and the Economy
